title: Is this supposed to be or not?
body: So yesterday I sign up for LoL PBE account and everything seems to work on. But while the client is downloading I tried opening my main LoL account and it's says some file are missing even I already downloaded everything even updates on it? Help me

replies.body:
It sounds like there might still be some files corrupted on your live server account. I would first suggest running a repair by using the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367). Usually it's one of the easiest ways to troubleshoot what's going on with technical issues such as this.

If you're still running into issues, be sure to [ticket us](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our Tech team can take a closer look at the situation.
Thank you for your comment! It worked for me now :)
